    Immigrant Assistance Hotline Number


    Fuerza Latina offers assistance to the families of immigrants who have been arrested or detained. Our bi-lingual volunteers can help people find family members and navigate the immigration system. Our volunteers are not attorneys and cannot give legal advice. Families may call 970-472-1501. Please leave a message and we will return your call.



    PROUDLY AN AFFLIATE OF: FFCAN.ORG
